Code Club will **restart for the 2024 fall semester on August 26^th^** and will be held
on **Mondays from 4-5 pm** via Zoom and with in-person locations in Columbus and Wooster.

If you [sign up using this Google form](https://forms.gle/eYkMvmJShrcANUrt5),
we will add you to our mailing list and keep you up-to-date!

_For an overview of all previous Code Club sessions, including from previous semesters,_
_see the **[Previous sessions page](/pages/previous.qmd)**._
